metadata.title: CVE-2019-11627 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: gpg-key2ps in signing-party 1.1.x and 2.x before 2.10-1 contains an unsafeshell call enabling shell injection via a User ID.

criterions.comment: signing-party: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
